name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Driven Senior Engineer with 13+ years of full-stack web application development experience, specializing in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and **Python**. Proficient in modern web technologies including **SCSS**, **REST**, and **GraphQL**, with a track record of successful CI/CD practices utilizing **GitHub Actions**. Experienced in deploying applications on cloud platforms such as **AWS**, enhancing performance and scalability.

Demonstrated ability in A/B testing, debugging, and collaborative problem-solving within cross-functional teams. Adept at integrating compliance-driven development aligning solutions with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in AI/ML initiatives and MLOps, with hands-on expertise in utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for advanced data processing.
